summary: This is an email from Nicole Simmons transmitting sealed documents filed in the case US v. Maxwell (Case No. 20-3061) to the Second Circuit Court of Appeals. The email includes attachments of a motion to consolidate and an exhibit, sent at the request of Adam Mueller.

persons.name: Nicole Simmons
persons.context: Sends the email transmitting sealed documents to the Second Circuit Court of Appeals on behalf of Adam Mueller.

persons.name: Adam Mueller
persons.context: Requested that Nicole Simmons send the sealed documents to the court; likely involved in the Maxwell case.

persons.name: Laura Mennin Mueller
persons.context: Copied on the email regarding the transmission of sealed documents in the Maxwell case.

connections.description: Nicole Simmons is acting at the request of Adam Mueller to transmit legal documents.
Both are copied on the same legal correspondence regarding sealed documents.

events.title: Filing of Sealed Documents in Maxwell Case
events.description: Sealed documents, including a motion to consolidate and an exhibit, were filed in the US v. Maxwell case (20-3061) and transmitted to the Second Circuit Court of Appeals.

keyFacts: Sealed documents were filed in the US v. Maxwell case (Case No. 20-3061) on September 10, 2020.
The documents included a motion to consolidate and an exhibit, transmitted to the Second Circuit Court of Appeals.
The transmission was handled by Nicole Simmons of Haddon, Morgan and Foreman, P.C., at the request of Adam Mueller.
